title: Deribit Aiming to Launch $XRP, $SOL, and $MATIC Options Amid Market Volatility Questions

title: Former Alameda Research CEO to Testify Against FTX CEO SBF in High-Stakes Fraud Trial

title: Billionaire Ray Dalio Says Cash Is Not Trash Anymore, Calls Asset Class Relatively Attractive – Here’s Why
description:
Billionaire investor Ray Dalio says that the “cash is trash” mantra is no longer true amid significant shifts in the macroeconomic landscape.
